title: Riots match making is flawed... well for me at least
body: 4/5 games are always like this. Everyone thinks i get matched like this because they think i'm smurfing. I'm being 100% honest in saying i am not smurfing and reason why i have Draaven  as a name because i saw Draven  as a character and decided to name myself that. Anyone else getting matched with these types of matches? Make it so fustrating trying to learn and i have to compete with these skilled players.

replies.body: happens in placements, my found that in my placements my first few games are always plat-diamond then when u lose a it drops and puts u against lower elo players, I tested it on a smurf won my first few games lost some of the later and placed gold 2, and on my main I lost few first and won the next 7 and got placed bronze 1
Worse still i vs a team of challengers every now and again...
